name: Snoopy and the Red Baron
summary: Snoopy and the Red Baron is a single-player game with the player guiding Snoopy on his doghouse with four variations of difficulty to play. The objective is to shoot down Snoopy's rival, the Red Baron, controls being the stick to maneuver Snoopy and the button to fire. The game starts out with the player having four doghouses, otherwise known as lives. It takes eight hits to destroy the Red Baron, and eight hits from the Red Baron to have the player lose a doghouse.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1983年11月
  • 游戏设计师: Nick Turner, Richard Dobbis
  • 美工: Sam Comstock
